department: Lipa City Environment and Natural Resources Office

external_services.service_name: Addressing Complaints pertaining to Garbage Collection
external_services.office: Lipa City Environment and Natural Resources Office

checklist_of_requirements.requirement: Letter of complaint – 1 original copy or phone call/ text message

steps.client_step: 1. Submit the letter of complaint/ make phone call/ send text message to Lipa City ENRO
steps.person_responsible: Public Services Officer III / Public Services Officer IV

steps.agency_action: 1.2. Verify the veracity of the complaint
steps.person_responsible: Public Services Officer III / Public Services Officer IV
Public Services Officer III / Public Services Officer IV

external_services.service_name: CENRO Clearance for New and Renewal of Business Permit at BOSS
external_services.image: /assets/document_background/CENRO Clearance for New and Renewal of Business Permit at BOSS
external_services.office: Lipa City Environment and Natural Resources Office
external_services.type_of_transaction: G2C – Government to Citizens, G2B – Government to Business
external_services.who_may_avail: All establishments applying for business permit to operate

checklist_of_requirements.requirement: Properly filled-up business permit application form
Environmental Compliance Certificate, Wastewater Discharge Permit, Permit to Operate

steps.client_step: 1. Submit the properly filled-up business application form
steps.agency_action: 1.1. Receive and record business permit application
1.2. Assess fees and input in the business application form
steps.person_responsible: Public Services Officer II / III / IV

steps.client_step: 2. Claim the signed business permit application form
steps.agency_action: 2. Release the business permit application form

external_services.office: Lipa City Environment and Natural Resources Office

steps.client_step: 1. Submit requirements and wait for advice

steps.person_responsible: City ENR Officer / Asst. City ENRO
Public Services Officer IV / III / Supervising EMS

steps.agency_action: 1.4. Approve and sign the notice of violation

steps.person_responsible: Public Services Officer IV / III / Supervising EMS

external_services.office: Lipa City Environment and Natural Resources Office

steps.agency_action: 1.1. Receive and record Official Receipt No.

steps.person_responsible: Supervising Admin Officer / Public Services Officer
